sentences.english: The Security Administration Punishment Law being paid close attention to has been enacted recently.
sentences.chinese: 倍受瞩目的《治安管理处罚法》新近出台。

sentences.english: Thee love of royal celebrities has always been staged for the world to see.
sentences.chinese: 皇室名流们的爱情总是如戏剧般上演，受到世人瞩目。

sentences.english: Table tennis is our national sport which gets most of the attention of the nation. It's very popular.
sentences.chinese: 乒乓球是我们的国球，在全国备受瞩目，相当流行。

sentences.english: Cathaya argyrophylla forest is a famous Tertiary relict phytocommunity-in the world.
sentences.chinese: 银杉林是当今举世瞩目的第三纪残遗植物群落。

sentences.english: In the 8th National Games the endurance events attract peoples attention among all track and field matches.
sentences.chinese: 八运会耐力项目在田径项目比赛中是令人瞩目的。

sentences.english: At that moment I become widely known, not for fame and gain, but meet you again.
sentences.chinese: 那一刻我万众瞩目，不为名利，只为再见你的容颜。

sentences.english: The research and arrangement of Veritable Records of Jiankang has obtained significant achievements.
sentences.chinese: 《建康实录》的整理与研究业已取得令人瞩目的成绩。

sentences.english: There once a boy named Harry. Destined to be a star.
sentences.chinese: 有个男孩叫哈利，他注定要受举世瞩目。

sentences.english: The rise of global history has aroused widespread attention in the history profession around the world.
sentences.chinese: 全球史的勃兴已经引起国际史坛的广泛瞩目。

sentences.english: Among all, the use of websites-learning plays the most important role in the educational circles of international French teaching.
sentences.chinese: 之中，又以网站学习应用最受国际法语教学界的瞩目。

sentences.english: Obama and Lee can raise the profile on human rights.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马和李可以提高世界对朝鲜人权问题的瞩目。

sentences.english: The tectonic problem of East Asia is one of the focuses of the world's concern.
sentences.chinese: 东亚大地构造问题是世界瞩目的焦点之一。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, there are five major impressive advantages of Cangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 从总体上讲，沧州有五大优势令人瞩目。

sentences.english: China has scored notable achievements over the past 30-odd years since reform and opening-up.
sentences.chinese: 中国改革开放30多年来，取得举世瞩目的发展成就。

sentences.english: But this year, O’Sullivan is himself the focus of most attention.
sentences.chinese: 然而在今年，奥沙利文自己却是众人瞩目的焦点。

sentences.english: The parades in Beijing in a few days time will be watched worldwide.
sentences.chinese: 十月一日将在北京举行的庆典举世瞩目。

definition: attention/to stare at/to fix attention on sth
to chase after (a popular person or item)/to pursue/popularity
to cause a sensation/to create a stir in (a place)/commotion/controversy
a craze/a popular wave/a hit with the public
lit. burn your hand, feel the heat (idiom)/fig. arrogance of the powerful/a mighty figure no-one dares approach/hot (exciting or in favor)
